column2: "Welcome back, Leader! I'm almost done here! I'll just add the Desert Pepper, and... Voila!"
"Khorshid! Leader and I have been cooking a meal! Would you like to try it?"

"Cooking? For me? But...
No, I can't refuse. You went to all this effort, after all."

"Hm...? This feeling...!
I remember this tingling sensation on my tongue. In the past, my mother would cook such meals for us..."

"This body has no sense of taste...
But this feeling passing through my nose... It's somehow nostalgic.
Hehe... Thank you both."
